item.title: Git Submodules
item.description: Embracing Git Submodules: A Journey to a Seamless Dotfiles Setup I had been using stow since it was simple, but I was tired of making countless number of directories. I believed there had to be a better way. and oh boy, yadm it was. In my quest towards a perfect dotfiles setup in my Arch Linux and Neovim PDE (btw), Git submodules turned out to be hero I needed but not deserved.
